data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهَ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word هُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
The word وَمَنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِيهِمْ comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
The word لِمَنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word حَسَنَةٌ comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
The word لَقَدْ comes from the root ق د and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.
data.sentence: The word يَتَوَلَّ comes from the root و ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to be close, near, follow, be up to.tawalla (prf. 3rd. m. sing.) - turneth away.tawallau (prf. 3rd. m. pl.) - they turned away.tawallaitum (prf. 2nd. m. pl.) - ye turned away.yatawalla (impf. 3rd. m. pl.) - he turns away.

data.meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized
data.sentence: The word الْغَنِيُّ comes from the root غ ن ي and is associated with the meanings: free from wants, having no wants, in a state of competence or sufficiency or rich or wealthy; dwelt, abode; sing, chanted; eulogized, satirized

data.meanings: to hope/expect, an opinion requiring the happening of an event in which will be a cause of happiness; expectation of deriving advantage from an event of which a cause has already occurred, keep awaited, put off, put aside, defer/delay, fear, beg/request. arja' (pl.) - borders, sides. marjowwon is a person in whom great hopes are placed (e.g. 11:62).
data.sentence: The word يَرْجُوا comes from the root ر ج و and is associated with the meanings: to hope/expect, an opinion requiring the happening of an event in which will be a cause of happiness; expectation of deriving advantage from an event of which a cause has already occurred, keep awaited, put off, put aside, defer/delay, fear, beg/request. arja' (pl.) - borders, sides. marjowwon is a person in whom great hopes are placed (e.g. 11:62).
The word الْحَمِيدُ comes from the root ح م د and is associated with the meanings: To praise.

data.meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
data.sentence: The word الْءَاخِرَ comes from the root ا خ ر and is associated with the meanings: go backwards, retreat/recede/retire, hold back/delay/postpone/defer, last/back part of a thing .Another, other, 2nd.
The word أُسْوَةٌ comes from the root ا س ي and is associated with the meanings: to be sad, solicitous, afflicted (with 'alaa).

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word وَالْيَوْمَ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
